forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers between 2pm and 3pm, then a slight chance of rain and snow showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 39. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
